review: I only gave 3 stars, though I like the potential of what Chromecast can be.  For all the potential of this device, there is limited out of the box functionality.  Probably most frustrating problem is that connecting and disconnecting can be hit or miss using the app, though it seems that screen casting is a "beta" feature (even though it has been out for a year).  Sometimes it works great, but of course when I try to show something to a friend it won't connect - though I am one of the folks haunted by Murphy's ghost.  I've also noticed when trying to help others set up the chromecast using their phones, the app interface is a bit confusing.  Hopefully it will become more useful for me after I try out with autocast with tasker which has some cool features most people would probably expect would be baked into Chromecast out of the box.  I am keeping my Chromecast with the hope that Google improves it to the point where it is reliable, and that autocast will bring some basic functionality to the experience of using it.
